subject: Football (College)
World War II (1939-45)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: During World War II, Chappuis’s bomber was shot down, and he was hidden from the Nazis by an Italian family before returning to play at Michigan.
snippet: During World War II, Chappuis’s bomber was shot down, and he was hidden from the Nazis by an Italian family before returning to play at Michigan.
